title: Unveiling the potential of emergent nanoscale composite polymer electrolytes for safe and efficient all solid-state lithium-ion batteries
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30618-30629
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05134C, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Adhigan Murali, R. Ramesh, Mohan Sakar, SeonJoo Park, Sung Soo Han
Solid polymer electrolytes provide excellent safety by replacing liquid electrolytes. Three types-solid, composite and gel-based electrolytes are widely used, improving battery life-span and preventing lithium dendrite growth.
